Articles.Content: just a quike quesion in need to know do you take the old pacher off before you put the new one on or do you just leave the old one and removeit after you got the new one on

You need to put the new patcher in your 0.16 folder and overwrite the old patcher.

Threads like this should go in 'Support' as well, if you could do that in the future. Thanks.
